content.detailedDescription: at 4:20 am i was sitting in my complex parking lot it was a very clear night temperature was probably about 63 degrees.I was sitting in my car looking up at the sky and from a distance of about 500-700 feet i saw a perfect circle, as bright a white light with glow on it soar downward to the ground i was in shock what i had seen,  was not a plane, helicopter or shooting star...Something came in and landed....And i was scared i went home to tell my fiance, and he said to get in touc w/ you guys!!!
content.summary: Bright white light  that soared in a downward motion.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside, on my apartment patio, smoking a cigarette.  i was looking up at the constellation orion when some clouds to my left cleared.  once the clouds moved away, i saw a sky-blue light that was stationary in the sky.  at first i thought it was just a really bright star, but i have never seen a bluish star before.  as i sat there, looking at this thing, the light coming from this object became more intense then would fade back to it's original brightness.  the object would continue to do this, from going dull, to an intense brightness.  this lasted for about ten minutes and it would never move.  in the end, the light became super bright then faded into the darkness of the night sky.
content.summary: Sky blue light changing intensity.

content.detailedDescription: A star like object appeared over the l.A. area, seemed to hover a slow speed.
content.summary: Weird star in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: As we walked outside to smoke, a friend of mine and i around 3:30 am i noticed a brighter then usual star...Flashing in the eastern sky. right away my respond was pointing to it and saying hey kyle u see that...And as i finished my sentenced the thing exploded with a big boom and making all dogs as far as i can hear start barking. the boom also was heard indoors as well because my sister came out to find out what the loud explosion was. while she was in route to come outside we watched the big fire ball it created in the sky, and releasing a craft with flashing lights or light (not sure how many lights there were on the launched craft) towards the southwest direction and climbing upwards slowly fading away until it was no longer visible,..While the main object remained in the spot it was and remained burning in the night sky for the rest of the time looking like a really bright star,...Only it was looking as if it was on fire still hours after it blew up exploded,....Launched whatever it did. as i am wrighting this the sky is getting brighter and soon it will  be fully lit,..But the object is still looking like a stationary fireball which soon is gonna be hard 2 see if at all.
content.shape: Bullet,  Missile,  Circle,  Fireball,  Flash,  Oval,  Star-like,  Other,  Unknown
content.summary: Star-like object seen exploding making a big boom over north phoenix dec 28, 2008, 3:30.

content.detailedDescription: Went out sode to have a smoke and was looking at the sky and saw a object rsembeling a boomarang 2 white lights on eatch end and a white beam cmming from the bottome fliying in a zig zag patern then i went in side to get a cam and it was gone
content.summary: Boomerang ufo flying north.

content.detailedDescription: My description of this ufo was reported this year but never followed through with the report i need too speak to someone, please email me with contact #.. or call..I am coming forward with also a video taken on cellphone by family member of the same thing i saw...One night i went outside too have a smoke and saw a fire in the sky with saucer inside it black/metalic with no lights and can see it very clearly with what looked like windows spinning counterclockwise but weren't it was  hovering no noise at 1000-2000'in front of me at a 22 degree angle 300'above ground and 400+ feet in diameter the craft was dripping what looked like molten metal every couple of minutes.I was a skeptic but this thing got me traumatized it has been five years since this sighting and i found no like videos on youtube or anything the only closest thing is a  video taken by family member it show the red molten metal craft above houses hovering and spinning with a orb trailing it going with a arc towards the ground it is very clear and i am trying to retrieve it from the old phone to upload on a computer.
content.summary: Saw alien space craft  red molten look 200-300'hover above ground

fallsview casino on the 18 th floor i decided
to take a shot of the falls --not one but two
when i got home and uploaded the shots to my
computer -i found this object which is bigger

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to work at about 6:15am on the morning of dec. 18, 2008.  i had just entered i-15 in layton heading south when i saw something flashing out of the corner of my right eye.  i drive a large box truck to work and it has large mirrors just like a semi would have.  my initial reaction for a split second was that there was an emergency vehicle behind me, but when i looked in the right-side mirror there was nothing close behind me.  then just above and left of the mirror, in the top right corner of the windshield i noticed an object in the distance.  it was in the sky to the southwest of layton and at first appeared to be about 15 miles away.  in my mind i knew that this would put it in the area of the salt lake int'l airport.  from my point of view it looked like a ball of light, one side green and one side red.  i immediately thought it was an airplane that was too far away for me to see clearly.  my office window at work faces the airport's flight path and is only about 2 miles directly south of the airport, so i see planes very close all day long.  anyway, i looked away for just enough time for me to think to myself that the lights weren't flashing at all.  i looked back over and noticed that the object had not moved whatsoever.  then, almost immediately an extremely bright beam of light shot out from the object and did about a 5 second scan across the cloud cover before all of it just disappeared in an instant.  just vanished.  when the beam shot out i also noticed that the object did appear to be a green and red "ball" of light and not two seperate lights as i'd first assumed.  the thing is is that when the beam lit up the clouds i realized that it was closer than i'd first estimated.  this time it seemed to be only about 5 miles maximum from where i was.  the beam itself also looked very odd.  it was extremely bright and lit up the clouds enough that i could see everything it scanned perfectly.  it happened pretty fast, but it definitely sent chills down my spine.  it was like nothing i'd ever seen before and the fact that it disapperared right in front of my eyes absolutely astounds me.  i kept looking for it throughout my entire drive and then some more when i got to work, but nothing.  one thing i did notice was that all of the planes i could see remained visible even after they had broken through the cloud cover, and they were even farther away than whatever it was that i saw.  i also noticed that every plane i saw in the sky that morning had two things in common that the other object didn't have.  first, all of the other planes had flashing lights and secondly, all of the planes lights were distinctly seperated from one another.  meaning i could see space between the lights.  i did consider the possibility of a helicopter, but i thought why would a helicopter be flying over the great salt lake?  especially at 6 in the morning. and why would it be scanning the sky instead of the ground or lake?  as i said before, i litterally watch planes take off and land from my office all day long.  i've had this office for about two years and not one time have i ever seen anything using any sort of spotlight.  never.  i checked in the paper, online, the news and even checked your site for an explanation.  i felt (and still feel) like there is no way that i could've been the only person to see this.  it was far too bright and far too peculiar.  i'm not saying that what i saw was an "alien spacecraft".  howeveer, i am saying that what i saw was by all definitions an unidentified flying object.  it gave me a sense of shock and excitement that turned to awe and wonder after i had some time to wrap my head around it.  it was very exciting and i feel like i have to share it.  i initially shared it with my boss and some co-workers immediately after it happened without really thinking what i would sound like.  i was met with jokes and strange looks like i was crazy.  bottom line is i don't care.  i know what i saw.
content.summary: Unknown object shot a beam of light and then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
This morning, december 19, 2008, at 6:30 a.M., i noticed an extremely bright light through our bedroom blinds...I literally yelled, ���what is that?!���

i quickly got up, pulled the blinds apart, looked up and saw an extremely large triangular shaped, grey bottomed object with 6 very bright white lights...One at each point of the triangular shaped object and one at each mid point of each side of the triangle.

it was silent, slow and quite low, approximately 4 stories off the ground ��� making its shape and color extremely clear.

it was traveling from the southwest to the northeast. the sighting lasted 3-5 seconds before it passed out of view.

i emailed a local television station within 15 minutes of the sighting asking if anyone else had seen a possible ufo in the area and later called the denver, colorado faa office as i had not received an email back from the television station.

the faa called back, asked me a number of questions, including my exact location and then asked me to forward a copy of my email to the television station. i was told they would call me back if they uncovered any information.

since, i have contacted a number of ufo sighting online sites, every radio and television station in the denver metro area.

this was an awe inspiring sight, a sense of calm and serenity enveloped me during the sighting and a memory i hope never to forget!
content.summary: Very low, very large, silent, slow moving, seemless almost glowing grey bottomed, trianglular ufo sighted with 6 while lights - 1 each tip - 1 midline each side

content.detailedDescription: I was in the parking lot of mesa mall in grand junction, colorado on approx. oct. 10, 2008 at approx. 3:00 p.M. i was taking pictures of the beautiful fall foliage and snapped the attached photo. the picture is facing south. the hills in the background are the colorado national monument, the building hidden in the backdrop is mcdonalds restaurant. i didn't notice the object in the sky (in the photo) until i set the picture as my desktop wallpaper for my computer (you may need to see an enlarged version of the picture to see the object in the sky.)again, i didn't see the object in the sky when i snapped the photo, and i didn't hear any noise in the skies at the time the picture was taken. this is the only picture i have of this object. i don't believe in ufo's and i'm sure i'm wasting my time sending this to you as i'm sure it can be explained as a terrestrial object (bird, plane, etc.) but, my friends insisted and persisted that i send it to you so you can make a professional judgment of the matter. this is why i waited so long to send it to you. again, i'm skeptical of it's 'other worldly' origin and i'm sure it can be explained as 'this worldly'. i apologize for wasting your valuable time with this photo, please forgive me, my friends were very persuasive.
content.summary: Picture of ufo (?) at mesa mall

content.detailedDescription: nov.30,2007 at 4:00p.M. on a friday we saw a daylight ufo in brooklyn.It was triangular in shpae w/3 reddish orbs at each corner. the object was next to the rooftop of a building on the corner of ave. z and nostrand ave. my wife was driving us and she stopped at a stop light and told me to look at the weird thing in the sky and to my amazement i did and i was in shock i rolled down my window and stuck my head out and pointed at it. it stood there petrified, except the reddish, pulsating lights. the object was pointed at the building like the arrow on the computer. i looked at it really hard and it was pitch black no bolts, seams, or windows; just black, but the lights seem to be alive, the way they moved. when the stop light changed the object swished away. i told my wife "let's follow it" and she said "are you kidding, we don't want to be taken." we both confirmed what we saw to each other and now i can say i've seen a ufo. the following days i told people of what i saw to see if anybody else did too, but no.
content.summary: While driving in brooklyn we spotted an object in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
It was aprox. 7:30pm on dec 25, 2008 on a very clear night.  i had been talking with my brother outside for awhile when i turn to look up at him that is when i noticed an unusual bright white light.  i stated to him "oh look here comes a satilite." he then turned to look and  stated "oh yes, i see it."  as we both were continue to look at it, he then said with concern "that's no satilite."  you can tell it was some great distance away but could not help notice that it was coming closer.  it wasnt coming closer as if to fly over but to pass by. as it was getting closer you can tell it was getting brighter but the light was changing too, the white light got so intense that it got bigger but now the light was a goldish bright color that it was an intensly twinkling and sparkling, it was like it was building up when suddenly the lights flared up then went out. i then said "it disappeared!" my brother then said "yelp, its gone."  no sooner that he said that when the lights came back but they were red.  we knew this was no satillite, plane, helicopter or star.  the light was too bright, sparkley, intense.  no beams shining down or anything like that. no sound, you heard nothing.  if it was a plane or helicopter you would be able to hear it even at a great distance.

not knowing what it was we both stood still just watching it, not wanting to take our eyes off it just to see which direction it will go.  it was moving at a slow pace. when the lights came back on we notice that there were three (3) red lights and each light was shaped as a circle close together but not touching but in a shaped of a v pointing towards the direction it was going.  still moving the same pace.  but these red lights were bigger but not brigher then the white goldish lights before. 

trees that were in the line of site had gotten in the way.  i move side ways to get a better view when now there were six (6) red lights.  a little smaller only because they were moving away from us.  i could not tell if the same v shape was there other then the lights now look together.  i can not tell you directions if it was north south east or west. my brother could give those types of directions but if i have to guess i'll say they were coming from the southeast to the northwest. how high or how far, i do not know.

we stayed outside watching this till we could not see them anymore.  the whole event lasted about 10 mins or less. during this event i was shocked and surprised to the point that i would catch myself not breathing.  i was very excited to have witnessed this. i will be going back to his property in hopes to see it again and maybe get a picture or two.

i welcome mufon to contact me if more info is needed.
content.summary: Unusual lights that converted to red lights in somerset, texas.

content.detailedDescription:
I went to visit my aunt and uncle in oatis, indiana from august 27th to september 2nd. my main reason for the trip was to visit my grandmother in her long term care facility. i live in tennessee and do not get up there very often as of late. i caught a cub's game and visited with my family for 4 days. my aunt and uncle own a lake house on lake michigan about 20 miles south of st. josephs on the beach. it is a beautiful place and extremely relaxing at night. the beach house is never the main reason i visit, but a nice bonus when my family offers it up for a few days of oasis. this visit my aunt allowed my girlfriend and i to stay there for two days, sept. 1st and sept second.
we arrived early on sept 1st and unpacked, went down to the beach and enjoyed the sun, later took in some shopping and had dinner. we noticed everyone packed up early afternoon and left there vacation homes due to the holiday weekend ending. we had planned to be back to tennessee on tuesday night so we had the beach to ourselves that monday night. the beach is basically a sand dune with a hundred feet of sand to the water. the water this night was calmer than usual and the night sky was clear and bright, yet without a moon. that afternoon i dug a pit for a fire and set it up knowing it would be hard to do that night with the wind, wasted time seeing that that night was extremely calm with tiny waves. people whom know this area, know that it can be very violent at night with huge waves and a brisk wind. we lucked out this night.
we had smores, a bottle of wine, fully prepared to spend an evening on the beach. we finished the wine and the smores and snuggled up by the fire. there was not a light to be seen for miles north and south along the beach. the only hint of light was st joseph's dull glow in the distance, 20 miles or so up the beach. 
the later it was, the colder it was, and the more we fully covered up. i am telling you this because i think what happens next is a result of two things: being fully covered up in the sand and directly behind a fire facing lake michigan.
we fell asleep and had to have been asleep for an hour or so. still fully covered by a blanket, i woke up and shook my girlfriend waking her up, so we could make the trip up the dune and to bed. as i uncovered my head, lying on my back, i rolled on my stomach and looked straight north up the beach. not more than 50 yards from me was a bright light, and i mean bright, a spotlight, like one you see shining at a carnival. i know what you are thinking, wow, that is not unusual, well let me finish. this light was stationary, pivoting from a stationary point directly over the shoreline, shining in the empty vacation homes and up and down the beach. within seconds, my girlfriend rolled over and we both stayed covered and gazing north at this light. this light was coming out of nothing, roughly 30 feet to 50 feet in the air, i could see the abrubt beginning and end of the light source. it reminded me of a flud light above a garage, only brighter and with no building. the light never moved location, only direction it was pointed in, from the edge of the water towards land. the stability of the source frightened me because that ruled out any of the five hundred things my mind was feverishly trying to catagorize this as. not a boat because i would be able to see the boat and the water was 2 feet deep under the location of the light. i do not remember what i said to my girlfriend, i just know she was just as shocked to be witnessing this as i was. it was calm and clear that night, no noise, only the gentle swish of the water rolling onto the shore. this light was close enough to us for me to throw a football and hit it square, extremely close. as the light pivoted up the beach away from us, still from the same 50 yard location, we could see more clearly the fact that it was coming out of nothing, clear sky!!!!
the light was very defined as for its boundries, i mean as it went up the dune, a very defined circle of light was cast on the beach and the dunes. at this point i ran out of explanations, some things do not need analyzing for you to know something is wrong. still facing the light and peaking out of the blanket, we found ourselves looking directly into the light, as it moved south along the beach towards us. the light disappeared as soon as it hit the spot we were laying. it was not blinding, which shocked me. we jumped up and could see nothing. although no moonlight was present, the stars were plenty of light for us to have seen anything in the location of the light. we saw nothing, gone, thin air. my girlfriend said, and i quote, "it went into cloakmode." usually i would laugh at something like that but it strangely seemed appropriate. 
i am a big guy, i mean i work out regularly and am scared of no one, yet something in me kept telling me to put the fire out and get upstairs, so i did.
this has been driving me crazy. i am glad to get it off my chest!
content.summary: A spotlight coming from an invisible source that was located in a place impossible for a spotlight to be.

content.detailedDescription: It was christmas night i just got a telescope for christmas wanted to set it up and show my son planet in sky not sure if it was mars or saturn i was having trouble zooming in so my brother in law tried he got it better than me but still couldnt see very well it was very clear out that night dont remeber seeing moon either all the sudden we were looking up at planet and talking and boom this light just appered to the south east of planet it was very high in the sky we both said there is another planet and all the sudden it started moving to the south at high rate of speed only lasted about 5 sec. was very weird i am familiar with military aircraft air dover airbase 30miles away this was not an airplane nor planet nor satilite i have seen satilites in the sky bofore this light appered like a bright planet but one minute ther was nothing the next it was there and then flew off
content.summary: Light in sky  appeared and took off.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving east bound on  highway 78, i had just past under the over pass rancho santa fe. in san marcos.  when i noticed something off to my left  in the night sky . the lights were so bite they seemed like car head lights, 4 of them and 1 little red on the left and 1 blue on the rightside  then i noticed first that it was very low and if it had been an airplane it was way to low but then i noted that there was no blinking lights as an airplane should be, if that is what it was. next there was no noise and because i was driving on 78 in the fast lane trying to see this object, but keeping my eye on the road, i also noticed that there was a car in the emergency (inside) lane stopped. i am not sure if they stopped to view this object also or what, but it did look like, as i past the car, that their car looked ok. by this time i was driving under the overpass street of ���twin oaks��� and i lost site of the object and couldn���t see it behind me. but i wanted to go back just to make sure it was what i thought it was but i was late picking up my son and boyfriend,  i just kept driving asking myself what the flock was that, what did i just see? and i am still wondering if anyone else saw this too in  san marcos
content.summary: 4 brite lites in front flying slow & very low. i thought it was gonna land on the freeway.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my girlfriend were driving south on lander ave.In hilmar ca. at around 2 a.M. on dec. 27 2008. all of the sudden noticed the sky pulsate and get bright.  we both leaned forward because the light seem to come from above the car, i was traveling around 50-60 mph. the sky was illuminated for a few seconds and i noticed 4 white/blueish lights in a line traveling east at a very high rate of speed.  they were visible behind the clouds for a split second then vanished.  these were nt military flares, it was not a shooting star, and no plane moves this fast.  i can't estimate the altitude of the lights but i know they were high enough to light up the sky for about 5 seconds.  i was in the army, i've been in iraq, i've seen war planes, flares, missles you name it.  what i witnessed tonight was something i've never seen.  i was not drinking, and i don't do drugs.
content.summary: Sky lit up, light pulsated, viewed 4 bright lights traveling at high speed.

content.detailedDescription:
My name's donald j browne. i've taken photos of ufos near ely cathedral, cambridge, england. i was there for the xmas eve carol service. the photos were part of a steetlamp experiment that was inspired by miceal ledwith and klaus heinneman's book the orb project.

i was fascinated by miceal's theory on orbs as fluorescing beings and had similar observations myself. i wanted to take the experiment into a different direction - that of shooting straight into fluorescing streetlamps. i have been astounded by some of the results.

but the biggest discovery was before i shot the photos. i was aiming the camera at the streetlamp when i saw the ufo materialise. i didn't even have my finger on the button to activate the infra-red or flash. like looking at the ufo in a live movie, i noticed something interesting. if i tilted the camera left or right, up or down very slightly, perhaps no more than 5 to 10 degrees, the orbs came into view or vanished, or demonstrated a partial materialisation as can be seen in the selection of photos. 

the ufos were perfectly still! if i moved the camera slightly left or right, i got the phenomena i've documented above. when i moved the camera back to its original angle, they were there again in clear view. i know it sounds unbelievable, but the photos i shot are the proof.
content.summary: Multiple ufo photos taken on xmas eve near ely cathedral, cambridge, england.

content.detailedDescription: I was looking out of the driveway and looked up to look at the storm clouds as the were forming.And the clouds looked like smoke and then i saw colored dots flying threw the sky.The dots were flying from north to south.And took pictures of the dots.
content.summary: It was 13 colored round dots.

content.detailedDescription:
On the night of january 20th, 2008 near the coast in south orange county, ca- i returned home after seeing a movie at the local theatre. i went up on top of the building in which i formerly worked, lied out on a sleeping bag and gazed into the sky for a short while.

i was positioned such that my feet pointed towards the ocean when i noticed a moving object in the sky from the corner of my eye.
i would say that when i first noticed the object in the sky it was approximately 60 degrees above the horizon from the north, and traveling almost at 

i locked my eyes onto it, and would describe it as being a dark gray circle/disc shape with several dim red lights triangular in shape (isosceles, 80,80,20 degrees) pointing inward. it could have been octogonally shaped, but i only consider this as a possibility because of the arrangement of the lights.

it took only 2 to 3 seconds before the object had flown completely out of sight in the sky. i remember watching it move at a constant velocity, from where i first noticed it all the way across what was nearly the zenith of my view of the sky, down to the horizon to my left at the south.

the object made no sound whatsoever.

i had a hard time determining the object's size, because i had no reference for its altitude. i would estimate it to have been 50% the size of the moon at its highest point in the sky on any ordinary night.

i think one of the most peculiar things about this event was that the size of the object did not seem to change much as it moved out of my perspective, so i believe that this object must have been flying at a good measure above the earth's atmosphere.

i cannot imagine this to have been an event observed of any military craft.

i am positive this was not a satellite- i have seen satellites before, and they are small and star-like in appearance.

this was much different, and much more awe-inspiring.
content.summary: Fast, silent, circle shaped with dim red lights zooming across night sky.

content.detailedDescription: We saw a bright orange glow shoot striaght up, then it flew directly over our heads.
content.summary: Round ball shooting straight up then as flew above looked like a round orange clown nose on a plane, white lights underneath.

content.detailedDescription:
Observed with steiner predator 8x30 binoculars from balchony of hotel room at bluefin bay resort in tofte mn. awoke my fiancee to see.
object traveled level to the horizen over lake superior at a steady rate of speed heading north from the south. conditions were very clear with no clouds, temp was 58 degrees, no wind at that time. object was approximately 3000 ft altitude and approximately 3-4 miles away from shoreline. i was puzzled and curious by this foreign craft and was thankful to have my binoculars handy. looking through my binoculars i became astonished that the entire body of this thing was glowing a light green! with no other lights or protusions. just a oval shaped glowing craft! i struggled to pull the binoculars from my face to awake my fiancee who was half asleep and very groggy. she seemed puzzled by the craft, then stubbled back into bed.
(i am a trained observer so my estimate may not be correct)
i grew up next to the minnesota national guard and st. paul airport and have had an interest in aviation my entire life. this was not any conventional or military aircraft as far as i am aware. i have researched material on weather ballons and other natural and uncommon atmoshperic conditions. this was not a weather ballon, reflections, atmospheric anomalies, etc. as far as i am concerned this was a u.F.O.
my fiancee says that she seen a bright green moving light and that it didn't look like a airplane, jet, or satellite.
content.summary: Very illuminated light green oval shaped.

content.detailedDescription:
This starlike anomoly has been appearing regularly according to my mother for atleast a month or more. her condominium is on the top floor of her building which provides a clear view over the horizon. most people would not look out their windows and see an unobstructed view like this due to surrounding buildings.  due to the heavy chemtrail spraying there is a kind of fog or mist when you look at the sky through a skewed view and this made it somewhat difficult to view the object with binoculars and possibly see some shape outside of the luminous center. simply put it appeared as a superbright star emitting light rather than the moon or other planet which reflects light and the intensity gave the impression that it wasn't as distant as an actual star in the night sky.  it remained absolutely motionless without flickering and didn't emit any other colored lights. it's position on the horizon was southwest from our position which was in the howard beach area and its vertical position was close to that of the moon. we gazed at it for about 5 minutes in intervals for about an hour.  later we returned to the balcony and the starlike object was gone.  i'm wondering if anyone else has reported this since it was very distinct in the night sky when compared to visible stars.  i can't see it clearly from my home since the roof is not high enough but my mother will be keeping an eye out for it's re-appearance this week. if i can get a good time lapse photograph of the object i'll be sure to foward it to you.  
reese a. edginton
content.summary: Very bright and larger than the north star, stationary.

content.detailedDescription: We saw an orange ball floating south to north above the tree line for about two minutes,then it blinked out, followed by military jets possibly chasing it.
content.summary: Orange ball.

content.detailedDescription:
Egg shaped ufo was stationary right on top 72nd and dodge street, omaha, ne.

since it was 11 pm, it too dark and before i could reach for my camera it was gone. but it was blinking 2 lights on each side ( left and right ) of an egg shaped ufo. it was vanished in a 15 seconds. earlier it was moving very fast but it stopped on that street. approx was at the height of 700km from earth and was forming an angle of 60 degree from my eye contact to that ufo.
hope this helps you !
content.summary: Egg shaped ufo seen on christmas day on the top of 72nd and dodge street, omaha.

content.detailedDescription:
seemed close; couple hundred feet elevation. absolutely silent and no other light pattern or color other than the circulating white light pattern. no fuselage visible at all. i was young, maybe 12 or 13.  i have seen blimps, balloons and all variety of planes and jets as arizona was a climate for all types of flight machines. also i had attended air shows. it was a time for modern air-ship development of which i was a young fan.
  when you are 12 and say "i just saw a ufo". adults say, "yes dear, that's nice".
the best example i can think of was the spacecraft in the hit tv show in the 60's  'lost in space'. i will never forget the circulating lights.  even then, i was aware of navigation lights on aircraft of which this was entirely unorthodox.  there was little stealth as if to state " here we are just cruising directly over the fastest growing city in america and we don't care if you notice or what you think".
  the place i was standing was at an irrigation canal at earl rd. & just east of 181st st. in scottsdale.
i don't think a sketch would help much, my description is the best i can do almost forty years later.  i can see it in my minds eye right now.  just think close and very large. hold your arms up and make a circle with your thumbs and index fingers touching, now spread out the circle separating your two halves of the circle (elbows bent at 90 degrees) until you are holding a basketball hoop.  huge. very bright. slow. silent. close.
  this is one of three i have never reported.  i wish i had more info, but at 12 yrs old i was not yet a great witness. i have just now purchased the only camera i have ever owned.
   i have seen all the lousy jittery, unclear, hand-held, laymen photos of some dancing light that could be anything.  i am now prepared to take high resolution, firm base mounted digital photographs at a moments notice. i keep the battery in my camera charged and i study the settings and i practice grabbing the camera to take calm/still photos at the right settings with other object in the view finder for reference. 
  this is something i never hear anything about; being prepared to take the good quality motion or still photographic evidence.  a free standing, hand held camera to a light in the sky results in a blurry, dancing light with absolutely no context and is virtually useless and may even discredit tan otherwise credible sighting.  spread the word-i am.

  no, we are not alone!  no aggressive action has ever taken place even though we are obviously inept towards any uninvited intervention or communion. 

  my first words ever on the subject of extra terrestrial encounters.  or as some believe may be the case; intra-terrestrial (aka uso's). are we just about to learn that we have neighbors right here on mother earth regardless of who got here first?   i hope so, for they have not hurt us, but whom are we hurting?
content.summary: Scottsdale, az. slow, silent e - w passing directly overhead. large phi-phenomenon clockwise white lights.

content.detailedDescription:
In response to the other grand haven report,i also witnessed the same thing i believe.I witnessed some very strange lights "orange redish colored" lights and a object with white, blue, and green continus lights not flashing in the south/southwest sky over lake michgan.The orange colored lights moved real fast in "v"-"w" movements. and also like the other grand haven report the objects did dives.Like the other man said, like "bomber dives" very fast and abrupt dives and allmost pattern like movements. the lights also would vanish and then re-apper a few moments later.
it became pretty clear it was like nothing i had ever seen in the sky above the lake in grand haven.Kind of strange that there have been these reports in the same area in ottawa county near lake michigan. and they all sound very simular in nature. this just reasures me that i am not the only one to witness these lights in the sky.
the "dive bomb" statement is very accurate, as well as the strange pattern like movements. nice to see im not the only one to witness.
thanks to everyone for posting your sightsings, please post more if you see anything. thanks, theanonymusguy
content.summary: Strange lights near lake mi. grand haven 8pm to 12pm.

content.detailedDescription: We were visiting relatives on boxing day.  a member of my family was stood at the back door when she observed 5 bright lights travelling across the night sky.  we quickly went to look ourselves and also witnessed the lights.  the lights were steady and did not flash.  they were yellowish and appeared to be moving in a rough formation travelling quite slowly.  as the lights reached the sky above the house they seemed to dim then disappear. further lights then followed taking a similar trajectory although no longer in any formation.  the last of the lights also appeared to change colour to dark less visable red and then back to yellow again.  i was shocked by what i saw as i am quite familiar with civilian and military aircraft as i work on a variety of mod sites and airports and i am used to seeing aircraft lights at night.  these lights were like nothing i have ever seen before and did not have the characteristics of aircraft lights.  the lights seemed to be large in comparison with normal aircraft lights.  there was no sound audiable as they passed.
content.summary: Lights in formation observed passing over neighbourhood.

content.detailedDescription: Flying back to kokata(india) from assam may be 280 d towards raj(waypoint) fl200 flashing object (orange)hovering at a same place.....
content.summary: Un excepted.

content.detailedDescription:
it was a beatiful friday evening, august 10th, 2007. i believe it was the night in which leonides meteor shower would be best seen. at about 11:30 pm my wife and i stepped out to the back deck with eyes pierced toward the sky. an object appeared to my wife in the eastern sky.....Just above the tree line. she stated, "what is that? oh, its a flock of geese." at this point it was know moving across the sky from east to north/nortwest.... i looked at what appeared to possibly be a flock of geese flying in a triangular formation as they sometimes do. but i immediately dismissed this notion. it was a very quiet night, i didn't hear the flapping of wings or any sound for that matter. it looked like dim lights moving across the sky, inaddion, the formation moved within a rectangular  wavey/shadow....The object was trying to blend in with the night sky, as the rectangular formation wasn't easy to recognize, it also blocked stars behind it. 
    it was not a flock of geese, a plane, or anything i had ever seen before. it was high enough to be a vey low flying plane, but again,it was complete silence. my instincts took over when i first noticed it, not what i thought it was, but what i knew what it wasn't....It was a very quick process of elimination. this all happened within a matter of 15 seconds. this doesn't sound like a lot of time, but i think time slows....Like when the ground shakes during an earthquake.....It seems much longer than what it really was. your adrenaline kicks in and reactions times are stimulated.
    i immediately questioned my wife with statements, "that's not a flock of geese! what was that! i don't know what that was!" i was whispering these statements as if we were being watched, and she spoke in a normal voice, until i told her to whisper. i was a little worried, excited, and puzzled.... and wanted to know what just happened, why did we see this, is there a reason, are we being watched by visitors, could this be a military devise. i don't let this get to me, but today the questions still linger in the back of my head. 
   as the object moved west, it vanished more so than it dissappeared into the distance.
content.summary: Came upon us motionless in the sky...Triangle information, encased in somewhat rectangular shadow and moved west to north east.
